contents.title: Net asset value (NAV)
contents.description: NAV represents the net value of the mutual fund calculated as the total value of the mutual fund’s assets minus the total value of its liabilities

contents.title: Sector Allocation
contents.description: Sector-wise holding and holdings’ value of the mutual funds.

contents.title: Stock held by the mutual fund
contents.description: This section shows the total number and percentage holding of the particular stock by the mutual fund relative to its overall assets.
